```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# some libraries you'll need for the Kruskal-Wallis test
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(rstatix)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

**Read the data**

```{r}

```


```{r}
# y = distance
# x = chamber
pwc <- data %>% 
  dunn_test(y ~ x, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")
pwc <- pwc %>% add_xy_position(x = "x")

res.kruskal <- data %>% kruskal_test(y ~ x)
res.kruskal

ggboxplot(data, x = "x", y = "y") +
  stat_pvalue_manual(pwc, hide.ns = TRUE) +
  labs(
    subtitle = get_test_label(res.kruskal, detailed = TRUE),
    caption = get_pwc_label(pwc)
  )
```
